details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: PDF/UA-1 validation profile (Human)
details.description: Validation rules against ISO 14289-1:2014 (Matterhorn Human-verifiable checks)

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of a structure element shall be semantically appropriate.

error.message: The structure type and attributes of a structure element are not semantically appropriate for the structure element.
